body:
Reported by fuchs...@googlemail.com, Dec 14, 2010
1. Control at least one creature (recommended Inkfathom Infiltrator) with double strike (= for example Fire Shrieker)
2. Your opponent controls either Dread or Dissipation Field
3. Attack with your creature and deal damage to your opponent

expected output:
The creature will be returned to its owner's hand / or destroyed after it has dealt first strike damage.
output:
The creature deals first strike and regular damage and is returned / destroyed afterwards.

Magarena 1.2

Comment 1 by project member ubeefx, Dec 14, 2010
Thanks for reporting.
Will requires changes in how combat is currently handled.
Also valid for Dissipation Field and possibly other cards.
